long_description: Warm, versatile and durable, the men's Patagonia Rubicon Down Jacket is a performance-riding workhorse. The 600-fill-power European goose down keeps warmth in and a bomber shell keeps elements out. High-quality 600-fill-power goose down is warm, lightweight and compressible. Durable, lightweight ripstop polyester is windproof and highly water-resistant, with a Durable Water Repellent finish. Helmet-compatible, 2-way adjustable, removable hood is also down insulated; visor provides visibility in bad conditions. High collar seals out snow, and microfleece panels at chin and back of neck feel soft and warm against skin. Patagonia Rubicon Down Jacket for men provides pit zips to release heat quickly. Articulated sleeves allow freedom of movement for increased comfort. Removable, lightweight stretch-woven powder skirt with snap secures webbing loop at center back and connects to any Patagonia snow pants. Zippered handwarmer pockets; zip chest pocket with secure media pocket and cable routing; internal stash pocket; internal drop-in pocket for goggles and gloves. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector in back of neck enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors to speed location acquisition in an avalanche. Adjustable low-profile cuffs secure over or under gloves; drawcord hem cinches to keep out cold; drawcord exits into handwarmer pockets for easy adjustment.
